featured.text: Boys’ names such as John, Peter, and Thomas are chosen from the Bible.
Each cookie 37 a strip of paper inside with an inspirational Bible quotation on it.
The Hebrew Bible states that Nehemiah, an official serving King Artaxerxes of ancient Persia, asked permission to travel to Judah.
One of the first European books to be printed in movable type was Johannes Gutenberg's 42-line Bible.

definition.zh_def: 聖經：基督教的經典文獻，包含舊約和新約。
definition.en_def: The Bible: A collection of sacred texts in Christianity, consisting of the Old Testament and the New Testament.
definition.example: She reads a passage from the Bible every morning.
